PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03212019-04-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActInquiries Act
SubjectExtension (final report deadline) - National Inquiry into Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls
PrecisOrder directing that a COMMISSION do issue under Part I of the INQUIRIES ACT and under the Great Seal of Canada amending the commission in relation to the National Inquiry into Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls, issued pursuant to Order in Council P.C. 2016-736 of August 2, 2016, as amended by Order in Council P.C. 2018-686 of June 6, 2018, by replacing "April 30, 2019" with "May 31, 2019" in subparagraph (x)(ii).
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
